response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. Considering the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $18,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure smooth integration and usage. I look forward to discussing how this product can positively impact your business or life. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 18000}
